document_data.title: Reclamation
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Reclamation''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Storm King's Thunder|Storm King's Thunder]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on the [[Beregost]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 11{{th}}- to 16{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''SEER has been rescued along with Ulcaster, the infamous Archmage that founded a wizard’s school that is now in ruins in the foot hills of The Cloud Peaks. However, while leaving to get the two to safety a cloud ship arrived, unloading a shipload of pirates on the ruins. SEER knows what they are after and needs the heroes to stop them and their leader.''|}}
